<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157161</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157161</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1045</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Compare Two Countries</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vergleichen Sie Zwei Länder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comparez Deux Pays</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compare Dois Países</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Confronti Due Paesi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συγκρίνετε δύο χώρες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Compare Dos Países</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Some countries in the world may have large areas of land with small populations while other countries have large populations but little land. In this activity the learners are going to compare various aspects of two countries.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">country facts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">world map</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">comparisson</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einige Länder in der Welt können große Bereiche
des Landes mit kleinen Bevölkerungen haben, während andere Länder 
große Bevölkerungen aber wenig Land haben. In dieser 
Aktivität werden die Anfänger verschiedene Aspekte von zwei Ländern
vergleichen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quelques pays dans le monde peuvent avoir de 
grandes zones de terre avec de petites populations tandis que d'autres
pays ont de grandes populations mais peu de terre. Dans cette 
activité les étudiants vont comparer de divers aspects de deux pays.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alguns países no mundo podem ter áreas grandes 
de terra com populações pequenas quando outros países tiverem 
populações grandes mas pouca terra. Nesta atividade os 
learners estão indo comparar vários aspectos de dois países.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Alcuni paesi nel mondo possono avere grandi zone 
di terra con le piccole popolazioni mentre altri paesi hanno le grandi
popolazioni ma poca terra. In questa attività i principianti 
stanno andando confrontare lle varie funzioni di due paesi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μερικές χώρες στον κόσμο μπορούν να έχουν τις 
μεγάλες περιοχές του εδάφους με τους μικρούς πληθυσμούς ενώ 
άλλες χώρες έχουν τους μεγάλους πληθυσμούς αλλά λίγο έδαφος. 
Σε αυτήν την δραστηριότητα οι αρχάριοι πρόκειται να 
συγκρίνουν τις διάφορες πτυχές δύο χωρών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Algunos países en el mundo pueden tener áreas 
grandes de la pista con las poblaciones pequeñas mientras que otros 
países tienen poblaciones grandes pero poca pista. En esta 
actividad los principiantes van a comparar varios aspectos de dos 
países.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Landtatsachen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Weltkarte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">comparisson</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plan de leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">faits de pays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">carte du monde</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">comparisson</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planta da lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fatos do país</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mapa do mundo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">comparisson</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programma di lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fatti del paese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programma del mondo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comparisson</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεγονότα χωρών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παγκόσμιος χάρτης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">comparisson</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">plan de la lección</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">hechos del país</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">correspondencia del mundo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comparisson</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
